pages.text: $(d)Spectre Coils$() allow you to wirelessly extract energy from your $(l:blocks/spectre_energy_injector)Spectre Energy buffer$(/l).$(br2)Each version can pull a different amount of FE/t from the pool. Place the Coil directly on the machine you want to power.
pages.title: Spectre Coils

pages.text: There are two special Coils that $(3)generate FE$() from nothing, instead of pulling from the Spectre Energy buffer.$(br2)The first can be found in dungeon chests, while the second is only obtainable via commands or creative mode.}
